course_description: This course considers topics in the empirical literature on asset pricing and investments.  The course will emphasize methodological issues and critical thinking about the interpretation of econometric analysis, as applied to financial hypotheses.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: Sa 10am-1pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W521
sections: Class Nbr: 6346, Section #: 5101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Sa 10a-1p, Instructor: T. Chordia, Status: Open
